faqs.question: How is this different from your social media solution page?
faqs.answer: Our solution content helps you understand the strategy and principles behind effective social media for accounting firms. This service is the done for you version where we actually create the content, manage the scheduling, and handle the ongoing execution on your behalf. Think of the solution as the playbook and this service as us running the plays for you.

faqs.question: Do we need to approve every post before it goes live?
faqs.answer: That is entirely up to you. Some firms prefer to review and approve content before publication, and we are happy to build that into the workflow. Others trust us to post on their behalf after the initial discovery phase where we learn your voice and preferences. We can start with an approval process and transition to a more hands off arrangement as you get comfortable.

faqs.question: Will social media actually bring us new clients?
faqs.answer: We are honest about this: social media for {audience} is typically more about building credibility and staying visible than generating direct leads. When a prospect searches for you or a referral source considers recommending you, your social presence reinforces that you are active, knowledgeable, and professional. That supporting role can make a significant difference in how your other marketing efforts convert.
